author: YamiKaitou#8975
name: PayDay
description: Customize your Bot's PayDay system with Hourly (1 hour), Daily (1 day), Weekly (7 days), Monthly (30 days), Quarterly (122 days), and Yearly (365 days) payday amounts
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data. This cog does store Discord UserIDs as needed for operation.
